title: Up
description: An old man ties balloons to his house to fly to South America, taking a young boy along for the ride.

title: Inside Out
description: The emotions inside a young girl's mind try to help her navigate a big life change.

title: Soul
description: A jazz musician's soul is separated from his body and embarks on a journey of purpose and self-discovery.

title: WALL-E
description: A small waste-collecting robot embarks on a space journey that decides the fate of mankind.

title: Coco
description: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead to unlock his familyâ€™s musical past.

title: Encanto
description: A magical family in Colombia discovers their home is in danger, and only one girl can save it.

title: Luca
description: Two sea monster friends explore life above water in a beautiful seaside town in Italy.

title: Turning Red
description: A 13-year-old girl starts turning into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

title: Brave
description: A Scottish princess defies tradition and must break a magical curse.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat who dreams of becoming a chef teams up with a young man to cook in a famous restaurant.
